title: Purchasing Riot Points; other means
body:
I am from the Phillipines playing in NA server. Are there any other means to purchase Riot Points aside from having a PayPal account and a credit/debit card? 'cause I can't have a credit/debit card yet. 
Does Riot distribute RP Cards here? 
Thanks in advanced.

replies.body: We'd like to help out with this if we can!  Reach out to us in a[ support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our billing team can look into this.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
Thank you so much for the quick response! I'll be sure to reach you via that link. I'm very much looking forward for what you have. Thank you!
You can use gift cards such as subway and  burgerking, or purchase a pre-paid card that you can exchange for RP/

Thank you for the suggestions! 
I don't think we have those here though. I'll try searching. Thanks!
